Dear Ms. Guiliani:
Attached is the Original Licensing Study Report for the above referenced facility. The
study has determined substantial compliance with applicable licensing statutes and
administrative rules. Therefore, a certificate of approval is issued.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and feel free to contact me with
any questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please feel free to contact the local office at (906) 226-4171.
Sincerely,
Don Collier, Licensing Consultant
Office of Children and Adult Licensing
Suite 11
701 S. Elmwood

II. METHODOLOGY

08/19/2004 Application Incomplete Letter Sent
Application in incomplete
09/02/2004 Inspection Completed On-site
09/15/2004 Inspection Completed Full Compliance
III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS & CONCLUSIONS
A. Physical Description of Facility
Northpointe Behavioral Healthcare Systems is a three county community mental health
agency which employs approximately 250 persons and services approximately 1400
consumers per year. Northpointe Behavioral Healthcare Systems’ main office building
is approximately 13,500 square feet and its annual budget is about 14 million dollars.
Northpointe Behavioral Healthcare Systems is located near Kingsford High School and
Middle School. Kingsford is a few miles off US 2 (a major east west route) and it borders
Iron Mountain.
B. Program Description
Northpointe Behavioral Healthcare Systems plan to have a three or four person Child
Placing Agency. They are planning to certify one foster home with a group capacity of 6.
Northpointe Behavioral Healthcare Systems’ foster care program will serve the
Community Mental Health customers they are currently referring to private Child Placing
Agencies.
C. Rule/Statutory Violations
Northpointe Behavioral Healthcare Systems is in full compliance with all Child
Placing Agency’s rules that can be assessed prior to obtaining Child Placing Agency
Approval. Northpointe Behavioral Healthcare Systems has all of the required policies
and clearances for Original Approval.
2

IV. RECOMMENDATION
I recommend the issuance of an original six month Child Placing Agency Approval.

Don Collier Date
